head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GREENZEIG, SELWYN THEODORE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GREENZEIG, SELWYN THEODORE

block.p: GREENZEIG-Selwyn Theodore. On Friday, September 15, 2000, of Cranford, NJ. Beloved husband of Lillian (nee Schwartz) Greenzeig and the late Claire (nee Stempler) Greenzeig. Loving father of Michael Greenzeig and Joan Gottlieb. Adored stepfather of Leonard, Jeffrey and Seth Schwartz. Cherished grandfather of Clayton and Cassidy Greenzeig and Risa, Jeremy and Daniel Gottlieb. Devoted brother of Marcia Trinker. Funeral services were held on Sunday, September 17. Interment at Beth Israel Cemetery, Woodbridge, NJ.
